item.description:
Hello All,





Happy Holidays to all!!!

Please take a moment to read the complete update below.... For the holiday season we will continue to participate in the holiday fundraisers. The 4th annual Paws and Claus Pictures with Santa will be taking place on December 8th and 9th from 10am-6pm each day, to be held at DOGGIE DAY PLAYCENTER (Tremont Street , Boston). Once again there is a $15 donation, and as a great big thank you for your generosity , your donation will include a picture of your Chihuahua with Santa ; and an email of the jpeg for cards and such.
This was a great success last year and loads of fun.....If any of our members would like to post last year`s pics on the message boards or photos section please do so.... This year proceeds will benefit Canine Companions.
Last year we also collected donations of pet toys , blankets, treats....for any members who would like to donate you may bring your donations to Doggie Day Playcenter on our next meetup....

I am hoping we can hold a fun little holiday party for all our members on our next meetup......



FYI quickie:

For the next few months our meetup will be held at 1PM at Doggie Day, Boston (Tremont Street) ONLY.




DOGGIE DAY PLAYCENTER ( 400 Tremont Street, South end, Boston,02116 ...our usual location 1:00PM ONLY!!!!
http://www.doggieday....


Happy Holidays...ST
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua December Meetup
